# Code of Conduct

This project and its community are governed by the following Code of Conduct to foster a welcoming, respectful, and inclusive environment.

## Our Pledge

We pledge to respect all contributors, irrespective of background, identity, or level of experience. Disagreement is not an excuse for disrespect.

## Expected Behavior

Participants should:

- Be respectful and courteous in communication
- Focus on constructive feedback
- Give credit where due
- Maintain a professional tone
- Assume good intent

## Unacceptable Behavior

Participants must refrain from:

- Harassment or discriminatory language
- Personal attacks or insults
- Dismissive or derogatory comments
- Public shaming

## Reporting

If you experience or witness unacceptable behavior, please file a private report via GitHub or contact the repository maintainers.

---

By participating, you accept and agree to uphold this Code of Conduct.
